scripts.build: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:frontend && bun run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix:frontend && bun run lint:fix:backend
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd frontend && bun install && cd ../backend && bun install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules backend/dist node_modules
scripts.clean:install: bun run clean && bun run install:all
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force && npx prisma db seed
